[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
What position did you play, when you played soccer in college?
I ended up being the goalkeeper for most games, not the most exciting position. 
Exciting when it really counts though! Do you miss it?
I do a bit, but I can relive those times by watching games on TV these days. 
That is a good point. I have been thinking that I want to be a voice on one of those soccer video games for a living.
That would be a dream job! Maybe I should get back into playing for real, It's good exercise. Could I join one of your games sometime?
Probably not an actual game, but I can reserve some time on the field. Maybe I can get some other friends to join so we can really play.
That sounds good, I haven't played in a while so something more casual would probably be best to start with.
Sounds great! Now the tough question: when do you have time?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Sports and Soccer', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A talks about playing soccer and an upcoming tournament, while Speaker B shares past soccer experiences.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: Well at least you like the work for now! I am still on the soccer team. We have a tournament coming up next week that I'm really excited for. I think we might have a chance to win it! ### Speaker B: Striker, right? How're you scoring these days? ### Speaker A: Right! It definitely feels like I'm on a hot streak. Hopefully it keeps up through the tournament. One of our other players is injured, though. Did you ever play sports? ### Speaker B: I played intramural soccer in college. Nowadays I mainly just watch it. I like Manchester United, they're my favorite team. Do you like a particular US or FIFA team? ### Speaker A: I love Arsenal, even though they aren't doing so well lately. I can't wait for the season to start up again. I do enjoy watching the international teams in the meantime. Having the tournaments on is so fun!' }
```
